articles.author: India Today Sports Desk
articles.title: Asia Cup 2023: Yuzvendra Chahal's drop from India squad disappointing, says Ab de Villiers - India Today
articles.description: Ab de Villiers has said that he has been left disappointed by Yuzvendra Chahal's omission from the Asia Cup squad. Chahal was snubbed from the 17-member squad for the Asia Cup in favour of Kuldeep Yadav.
articles.content:
Ab de Villiers has said that he was left a bit disappointed by the exclusion of Yuzvendra Chahal from the squad for the upcoming Asia Cup 2023. 
The decision to exclude Chahal from the squad was met… [+1658 chars]
